Once submitted, the expense record will enter the approval workflow.

Once approved, the status will be updated to "Approved".

submit.title: Confirm Submission
submit.description: Are you sure you want to submit ChargeOut "{name}"? After submission, it cannot be edited and will require supervisor review.

confirm.title: Confirm ChargeOut
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to confirm ChargeOut "{name}"? After confirmation, it can be marked as paid.

reject.title: Reject ChargeOut
reject.description: Are you sure you want to reject ChargeOut "{name}"? After rejection, the status will change to Rejected.

markAsPaid.title: Mark as Paid
markAsPaid.description: Are you sure you want to mark ChargeOut "{name}" as paid? This action indicates the expense has been transferred.

delete.title: Confirm Delete
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete ChargeOut "{name}"? This action cannot be undone, and all related expense items will also be deleted.

messages.submitSuccessDesc: ChargeOut {name} has been submitted for review
messages.markAsPaidSuccessDesc: ChargeOut {name} has been marked as paid
